actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to add 90 miles to the Interstate System and provide for the inclusion of a critical north-south highway corridor.

summary.text: Authorizes an additional 90 miles to the Interstate System and authorizes $150,000,000 to be appropriated out of the Highway Trust Fund in order to improve ninety miles of U.S. Route 219 between I-76 and I-80 to full interstate standards.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to add 90 miles to the Interstate System and provide for the inclusion of a critical north-south highway corridor.
